[{"id":"78","id_user":"1","id_parent":"23","tenbaiviet_vi":"M\u1eabu b\u00e1nh sinh nh\u1eadt tr\u00e1i tim in h\u00ecnh c\u1eb7p \u0111\u00f4i - MIH007","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><strong>M&Ocirc; T\u1ea2 NG\u1eaeN:<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; &nbsp;C\u1ed1t b&aacute;nh: B&ocirc;ng lan cacao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; &nbsp;Mousse b&aacute;nh:&nbsp;Ph&ocirc; mai mascarpone, tr\u1ee9ng, kem t\u01b0\u01a1i whipping, c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, r\u01b0\u1ee3u Rhum; M\u1eb7t b&aacute;nh r\u1eafc b\u1ed9t cacao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; &nbsp;V\u1ecb b&aacute;nh: b&aacute;nh b&eacute;o d\u1ecbu, th\u01a1m socola v&agrave; caf&eacute;, n\u1ed3ng nh\u1eb9 t\u1eeb r\u01b0\u1ee3u.<\/p>","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>&hearts; TIRAMISU&nbsp;l&agrave; m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i b&aacute;nh ng\u1ecdt tr&aacute;ng mi\u1ec7ng v\u1ecb c&agrave; ph&ecirc; r\u1ea5t n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a n\u01b0\u1edbc &Yacute;. B&aacute;nh&nbsp;g\u1ed3m c&aacute;c l\u1edbp b&aacute;nh Lady Fingers (Savoiardi, [savo\u02c8jardi] (l&agrave; m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i b&aacute;nh quy, gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 b&aacute;nh champaign c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam nh\u01b0ng ngon h\u01a1n) nh&uacute;ng c&agrave; ph&ecirc; v&agrave; r\u01b0\u1ee3u&nbsp;xen k\u1ebd v\u1edbi h\u1ed7n h\u1ee3p tr\u1ee9ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng, ph&ocirc; mai mascarpone \u0111&aacute;nh b&ocirc;ng. V\u1ecb \u0111\u1eafng c\u1ee7a tiramisu c&oacute; nh\u1edd l\u1edbp b\u1ed9t cacao ph\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1u m\u1eb7t b&aacute;nh. C&ocirc;ng th\u1ee9c b&aacute;nh n&agrave;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebfn t\u1ea5u th&agrave;nh nhi\u1ec1u m&oacute;n b&aacute;nh v&agrave; m&oacute;n tr&aacute;ng mi\u1ec7ng kh&aacute;c nhau. &nbsp;Lady fingers c&oacute; th\u1ec3 thay th\u1ebf b\u1eb1ng b&aacute;nh b&ocirc;ng lan gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 Dolce Vita \u0111ang &aacute;p d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; B\u1edfi nh\u1eefng th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t m&agrave; chi\u1ebfc b&aacute;nh Tiramisu c&oacute; m\u1ed9t h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t: n\u1ed3ng ch&aacute;t t\u1eeb r\u01b0\u1ee3u, \u0111\u1eafng t\u1eeb chocolate, v\u1ecb cafe v&agrave; v\u1ecb b&eacute;o t\u1eeb phomai. Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i t\u1ef1 h&agrave;o l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng n\u01a1i l&agrave;m ra chi\u1ebfc b&aacute;nh Tiramisu \u0111&uacute;ng ngh\u0129a.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" data-thumb=\"original\" original-height=\"600\" original-width=\"600\" src=\"https:\/\/bizweb.dktcdn.net\/100\/163\/301\/files\/tiramisu-mousse-cake-banh-kem-y-quan-1-2.png?v=1502441752754\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; B&aacute;nh \u1ed5 Tiramisu th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng \u1edf Dolce Vita s\u1ebd c&oacute; c\u1ed1t l&agrave; b&aacute;nh b&ocirc;ng lan chocolate m\u1ecfng. C\u1ed1t b&aacute;nh l&agrave; lady fingers c&oacute; \u1edf ph\u1ea7n b&aacute;nh ly Tiramisu. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c b&aacute;nh \u1ed5 nguy&ecirc;n b\u1ea3n v\u1edbi lady fingers th&igrave; vui l&ograve;ng ch\u1ecdn b&aacute;nh Tiramisu Ladyfingers. Tuy v\u1eady, ch\u1ee7 quan c\u1ee7a ti\u1ec7m th&igrave; Ladyfinger m\u1eb7c d&ugrave; \u0111&uacute;ng nguy&ecirc;n b\u1ea3n h\u01a1n, nh\u01b0ng d&ugrave;ng c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c s\u1ebd kh&ocirc; v&agrave; c\u1ee9ng h\u01a1n b&ocirc;ng lan n&ecirc;n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd c\u1ea3m th\u1ea5y kh&ocirc;ng ngon b\u1eb1ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; Dolce Vita s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1eefng nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u t\u01b0\u01a1i ngon v&agrave; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ed9 &ldquo;ngon v&agrave; l&agrave;nh&rdquo; c\u1ee7a b&aacute;nh cao nh\u1ea5t. Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i n&oacute;i kh&ocirc;ng v\u1edbi ch\u1ea5t b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n, ch\u1ea5t t\u1ea1o \u0111&ocirc;ng, t\u1ea1o x\u1ed1p..<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; &nbsp;H&atilde;y ch\u1ecdn m\u1ed9t c\u1ee1 b&aacute;nh ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0103n \u0111\u1ec3 th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c v\u1ecb b&aacute;nh ngon nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ebfu kh&ocirc;ng d&ugrave;ng h\u1ebft ,vui l&ograve;ng cho v&agrave;o h\u1ed9p k&iacute;n v&agrave; b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n t\u1ee7 l\u1ea1nh \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong v&ograve;ng 3 ng&agrave;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts;&nbsp; B&aacute;nh t\u1eeb 220.000\u0111 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao mi\u1ec5n ph&iacute; trong v&ograve;ng 3km, v&agrave; t&iacute;nh ph&iacute; n\u1ebfu xa h\u01a1n. B&aacute;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n t\u1ed1t trong v&ograve;ng 45 ph&uacute;t di chuy\u1ec3n b\u1eb1ng xe m&aacute;y. N\u1ebfu c&aacute;ch xa h\u01a1n th\u1eddi gian tr&ecirc;n, b\u1ea1n n&ecirc;n c&acirc;n nh\u1eafc khi \u0111\u1eb7t b&aacute;nh \u1edf ti\u1ec7m v&igrave; ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ecbu tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m n\u1ebfu b&aacute;nh h\u1ecfng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts;&nbsp; Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i ch\u1ec9 giao b&aacute;nh trong khu v\u1ef1c TP HCM. N\u1ebfu \u1edf xa h\u01a1n, b\u1ea1n c\u1ea7n ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n b&aacute;nh.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&hearts; &nbsp;Vui l&ograve;ng \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc &iacute;t nh\u1ea5t 4 ti\u1ebfng&nbsp;\u0111\u1ec3 ti\u1ec7m b&aacute;nh ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 b\u1ea1n t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ebfu \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1eadn gi\u1edd, ti\u1ec7m ch\u1ec9 c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 nh\u1eefng b&aacute;nh c&oacute;
